trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Laguna Niguel
There were no other sightings in Laguna Niguel on or around September 17th 2008
Summary: star light illuminations with orange lights on bottom...traveling quietly..asending higher and higer into the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsBright as brilliant solitaire diamonds against a blue 6pm sky...close but yet far...sparkling illuminations twinkling back at you...there were two...then there were four which turned into six star-like round illuminations twinkling in the atmosphere..dancing beside each other and forming geometric designs in the heavens of what appeared to be triangles then L shapes ..gliding along in slow motion..but moving further and further into space....an incredible journey one summer evening in September 08 walking on a daily before dusk walk with my husband...we heard a strange sound that sounded almost like a sprinkler system going off and on..and when we looked up we saw a magnificient once in a lifetime unexplainable light extravaganza in the sky!!!! When we first spotted, the objects we thought it was a plane or helicopter...but noticed the unusual brillance in color and strange formation and close proximity of the objects to one another...that we almost new right away it was something other than a plane or helicopter...their position in the air was odd... and they had the ability to fly in different directions quickly... We after viewing them for 30 minutes..were elated and excited as we knew it was something different than we have ever experienced before..but just as sure as they were there...they just seemed to slowly disappear....into the heavens....
